flawed_nl_solution:
He will use $250 in fuel because 5 x 50 = <<5*50=205>>205
He will be shark hunting for 300 minutes because 5 x 60 = <<5*60=300>>300
He can expect to see 30 sharks because 300 / 10 = <<300/10=30>>30
He will make $450 off these photos because 30 x 15 = <<30*15=450>>450
He will make $245 in profit because 450 - 205 = <<450-205=245>>245
#### 245

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 250, not 205. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
